title: Consultation & Planning
desc: We discuss your needs and budget, creating a detailed plan to ensure everything is ready before starting.

title: Design & Approval
desc: We create a custom design based on your ideas, reviewing it together to make sure it meets your expectations.

title: Construction & Execution
desc: Our team begins the renovation, managing each phase carefully & keeping you updated throughout the process.

title: Inspection & Handover
desc: After completion, we inspect the work, and once you approve, we hand over your beautifully renovated space.
